amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 8039 from the bill. Section 8039 prohibits funds from being used to convert to contractor performance an activity or function performed by civilian employees, unless certain conditions are met.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 8039 from the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Amash amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 233 (Roll no. 478).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Amash amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 233 (Roll no. 478).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Amash.
